name: Pharma Packaging and Technical Operations MasterClass
content: The online training course will support you in collecting, sorting, and proper understanding of the requirements of the procedures of pharma and healthcare packaging and technical operations. The trainings curse will also focus on anti-counterfeiting, serialisation, and tamper evidence on the packaging of medicinal products. Generally, the course will cover a 360-degree view on healthcare and pharma packaging and packaging operations. The online training course is also organized to foster internal discussion, sharing ideas, and exchange of internal knowledge amongst participants and the trainer in order to balance different levels of knowledge and experience in the training subjects. The online training course will also help to change the perspective of thinking of the participants to consider their own expertise and behavior.
